# particleVelocity

**Instance Property**

The initial speed, in units per second, for newly spawned particles. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var particleVelocity: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Particles begin moving at this speed in the direction determined by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/birthDirection] or [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/emittingDirection] property. Their directions and speeds may change thereafter according to the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/acceleration] property or physics effects (see the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/isAffectedByGravity], [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/isAffectedByPhysicsFields], and [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/colliderNodes] properties). You can randomize the speed of newly spawned particles with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleAngularVelocityVariation] property.

Particle speed is measured in units (of the local coordinate space containing the particle system) per second.

The default value is `0.0` units per second, specifying that newly emitted particles are stationary until otherwise influenced.

You can animate changes to this property’s value. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/animating-scenekit-content].

## Managing Particle Motion

- **particleAngle**: The rotation angle, in degrees, of newly spawned particles. Animatable.
- **particleAngleVariation**: The range, in degrees of randomized initial particle angles. Animatable.
- **particleVelocityVariation**: The range, in units per second, of randomized initial particle speeds. Animatable.
- **particleAngularVelocity**: The initial spin rate, in degrees per second, of newly spawned particles. Animatable.
- **particleAngularVelocityVariation**: The range, in degrees per second, of randomized initial angular velocities for particles. Animatable.
- **particleLifeSpan**: The duration, in seconds, for which each particle is rendered before being removed from the scene. Animatable.
- **particleLifeSpanVariation**: The range, in seconds, of randomized particle life spans. Animatable.
